source: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_SEQ_00<tab>Gabineaux at Gabineaux's Bower is looking for an adventurer to deal with a parasite funguar infestation.
target: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_SEQ_00<tab>ガビノー親方の小屋の、ガビノーは、木に生えたパラサイトファンガーを退治してくれる人を探しているようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_SEQ_01<tab>Defeat the parasites after using the amber unguent you received from Gabineaux to peel them from the three specified trees.
target: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_SEQ_01<tab>指定された3本の木に、ガビノーから受け取った「琥珀色の薬液」を使い、パラサイトファンガーを引き剥がして討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_SEQ_02<tab>You have exterminated the parasite funguars. Report to Gabineaux at Gabineaux's Bower.
target: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_SEQ_02<tab>パラサイトファンガーの討伐を終えた。「ガビノー親方の小屋」の「ガビノー」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_SEQ_03<tab>Gabineaux is nothing short of ecstatic at the news of the funguars' demise. It seems he had been unable to sleep for worry, but your deeds have put his mind at rest.
target: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_SEQ_03<tab>パラサイトファンガーの討伐を聞いたガビノーは大いに喜んでくれた。彼は、夜も眠れぬほど木のことを心配していたようだ。ぐっすりと眠れば、彼の心も落ち着くだろう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_TODO_00<tab>Apply the amber unguent to the ailing trees and slay parasite funguars.
target: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_TODO_00<tab>蝕まれた木に琥珀色の薬液を使い、パラサイトファンガーを討伐

source: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_TODO_01<tab>Report to Gabineaux at Gabineaux's Bower.
TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_1<tab>Gods damn you mushroom-headed, spindly-legged, spore-spewing abominations! Suck the life out of my precious trees, will you!?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_1おのれぇ……にっくき「パラサイトファンガー」めぇぇ。
私の大切な木に生えおって……おのれぇ……

source: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_2<tab>Damn you to the seven─ Hm? Oh! Thank the Matron! You look like just the sort to help me deal with this nightmare.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_2って、おお！？
もしや君、冒険者か！？
ちょうどいい、私の依頼を受けてくれ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_3<tab>My poor trees─trees I have tended since they were scarcely saplings, I might add─have been infested with parasite funguars! If I let those pests have their way, my babies will be naught but deadwood before the week is out.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_3私が手塩にかけて育てた木に
「パラサイトファンガー」が取り付いたのだ。
奴らをそのままにしていては、木が枯れてしまう！

source: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_4<tab>Smear a little of this amber unguent on an infested tree, though, and the horrid creatures will drop clean off─allowing you to administer adventurer-style vengeance!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_4この「琥珀色の薬液」を撒けば、
パラサイトファンガーどもが木から剥がれ落ちる。
そこを一網打尽にしてくれ！！

source: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_5<tab>Mwahahahahaha! Did you hear that, you malignant toadstools!? Your end is nigh!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_5ふははははっ！
憎きファンガーどもめ！　これで終わりだ！！

source: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_6<tab>You'll rue the day you─ Ahem! My apologies. The wrath was upon me. Fear not, I am now quite calm. So, the funguars─<var 1A 02 /var>bastards that they are<var 1A 01 /var>─have attached themselves to three trees.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_6……ふぅ、すまない、少し取り乱してしまった。
パラサイトファンガーが生えちまったのは3箇所だ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_7<tab>Once you've ground those treacherous mushrooms into a pulp beneath your righteous boots, come back and tell me <var 1A 02 /var>exactly<var 1A 01 /var> how it felt!
target: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_7<tab>奴らを細切りにしたら、私に勝利の報告をしてくれ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_10<tab>Well? Did you take care of my funguar infestation? Yes! At last, I can enjoy a restful night's sleep...
target:
TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_10おお！　パラサイトファンガーどもを駆除してくれたか！
よくやってくれたな！　これでようやく安眠できる……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_11<tab>I must say, I'm glad to meet an adventurer of such talents! Just look at you in all your fungus-spattered glory! You have my thanks!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_GABINEAUX_000_11君は実に見所のある冒険者だな！
本当にありがとう！

source: TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_SYSTEM_000_20<tab>A parasite funguar peels from the tree and falls at your feet!
TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_SYSTEM_000_21<tab>A parasite funguar peels from the tree and falls at your feet!
TEXT_SUBFST033_00127_SYSTEM_000_22<tab>A parasite funguar peels from the tree and falls at your feet!
